mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES(#{id}, #{memid}, #{title} , #{content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'N', 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.MEMID, B.USERNAME AS "MEMNAME", A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.CREATEDATE, A.UPDATEDATE, A.DELETED, A.VCNT, A.GCNT, A.BCNT FROM BOARD A JOIN MEMBERS B ON A.MEMID = B.ID ORDER BY A.ID DESC

SELECT A.ID, A.MEMID, B.USERNAME AS "MEMNAME", A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.CREATEDATE, A.UPDATEDATE, A.DELETED, A.VCNT, A.GCNT, A.BCNT FROM BOARD A JOIN MEMBERS B ON A.MEMID = B.ID WHERE A.MEMID = #{memid} ORDER BY A.ID DESC

SELECT A.ID, A.MEMID, B.USERNAME AS "MEMNAME", A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.CREATEDATE, A.UPDATEDATE, A.DELETED, A.VCNT, A.GCNT, A.BCNT FROM BOARD A JOIN MEMBERS B ON A.MEMID = B.ID WHERE A.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%' ORDER BY A.ID DESC
SELECT A.ID, A.MEMID, B.USERNAME AS "MEMNAME", A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.CREATEDATE, A.UPDATEDATE, A.DELETED, A.VCNT, A.GCNT, A.BCNT FROM BOARD A JOIN MEMBERS B ON A.MEMID = B.ID WHERE A.ID = #{id}
